Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam is back as a captain for Pakistan.
Michael Bracewell is the captain of the New Zealand team, and they will miss key players due to IPL commitments and personal reasons.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Muhammad Amir and Imad Wasim are back in the Pakistan team after a long gap.
New Zealand will face a massive challenge without their top players.
Others: The series will be a massive challenge for Michael Bracewell as captain of the New Zealand team.
The Pakistan vs New Zealand t20 series will be a great fun for cricket lovers from Pakistan and around the world.
